attributes.action: remove the EMA household income bands, allowing everyone of the age 16-18 to qualify.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the current government EMA scheme, we see that many of us are not eligible for the payment. If your household income is over £30,000 (variable), you will not be eligible. The government are discriminating the families that lie above the eligibility band, preventing the student from earning EMA. Do they expect the household income to finance all of the educational needs? 

I hope not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
